A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It's tough to enjoy a movie when half of the storyline is terrible. The Rose and Finn storyline feels forced and unnecessary\, you're wishing you could fast forward through it the entire time. A lot of themes and looming questions from Force Awakens are eliminated or have very unsatisfactory answers to them. I was really disappointed with this movie because they really had all of the elements to make it truly great. Just a complete miss... the franchise shouldn't be trusted with Rian Johnson.
